properties.name: draco.sqlite.database.path
properties.description: File path where the databases are created. May be relative or absolute.

properties.name: draco.telemetrie.export.path
properties.description: File path where the telemetrie reports are put.

properties.name: draco.internal.socket.port
properties.description: Port where the websocket is started.

properties.name: draco.internal.socket.path
properties.description: Path where the websocket is started.

properties.name: draco.rest.tls
properties.description: Whether the REST-API can be reached via tls externally.

properties.name: draco.rest.host
properties.description: Externally reachable host for the REST-API.

properties.name: draco.rest.port
properties.description: Externally reachable port for the REST-API.

properties.name: draco.socket.tls
properties.description: File path where the databases are created. May be relative or absolute.

properties.name: draco.socket.host
properties.description: Whether the Socket can be reached via tls externally.

properties.name: draco.socket.port
properties.description: Externally reachable port for the Socket.
